verses.verse: But it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> within a while <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3117><s%> after, in the time <S%H3117><s%> of wheat <S%H2406><s%> harvest, <S%H7105><s%> that Samson <S%H8123><s%> visited <S%H6485><s%> <S%H853><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> with a kid; <S%H1423><s%> <S%H5795><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> I will go in <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> my wife <S%H802><s%> into the chamber. <S%H2315><s%> But her father <S%H1><s%> would not <S%H3808><s%> suffer <S%H5414><s%> him to go in. <S%H935><s%>

And her father <S%H1><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I verily thought <S%H559><s%> <S%H559><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou hadst utterly hated <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8130><s%> her; therefore I gave <S%H5414><s%> her to thy companion: <S%H4828><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> her younger <S%H6996><s%> sister <S%H269><s%> fairer <S%H2896><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> she? take <S%H1961><s%> her, I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> instead <S%H8478><s%> of her.

And Samson <S%H8123><s%> said <S%H559><s%> concerning them, Now <S%H6471><s%> shall I be more blameless <S%H5352><s%> than the Philistines, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6430><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H5973><s%> them a displeasure. <S%H7451><s%>

And Samson <S%H8123><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and caught <S%H3920><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> foxes, <S%H7776><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> firebrands, <S%H3940><s%> and turned <S%H6437><s%> tail <S%H2180><s%> to <S%H413><s%> tail, <S%H2180><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> a <S%H259><s%> firebrand <S%H3940><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> between <S%H996><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tails. <S%H2180><s%>

And when he had set <S%H1197><s%> the brands <S%H3940><s%> on fire, <S%H784><s%> he let them go <S%H7971><s%> into the standing corn <S%H7054><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and burnt up <S%H1197><s%> both the shocks, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1430><s%> and also <S%H5704><s%> the standing corn, <S%H7054><s%> with <S%H5704><s%> the vineyards <S%H3754><s%> and olives. <S%H2132><s%>

Then the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> this? <S%H2063><s%> And they answered, <S%H559><s%> Samson, <S%H8123><s%> the son-in-law <S%H2860><s%> of the Timnite, <S%H8554><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he had taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> his wife, <S%H802><s%> and given <S%H5414><s%> her to his companion. <S%H4828><s%> And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> came up, <S%H5927><s%> and burnt <S%H8313><s%> her and her father <S%H1><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

And Samson <S%H8123><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Though <S%H518><s%> ye have done <S%H6213><s%> this, <S%H2063><s%> yet <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> will I be avenged <S%H5358><s%> of you, and after that <S%H310><s%> I will cease. <S%H2308><s%>

And he smote <S%H5221><s%> them hip <S%H7785><s%> and <S%H5921><s%> thigh <S%H3409><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter: <S%H4347><s%> and he went down <S%H3381><s%> and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the top <S%H5585><s%> of the rock <S%H5553><s%> Etam. <S%H5862><s%>
Then the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> went up, <S%H5927><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and spread themselves <S%H5203><s%> in Lehi. <S%H3896><s%>

And the men <S%H376><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> are ye come up <S%H5927><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> us? And they answered, <S%H559><s%> To bind <S%H631><s%> <S%H853><s%> Samson <S%H8123><s%> are we come up, <S%H5927><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> to him as <S%H834><s%> he hath done <S%H6213><s%> to us.

Then three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of Judah <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3063><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the top <S%H5585><s%> of the rock <S%H5553><s%> Etam, <S%H5862><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to Samson, <S%H8123><s%> Knowest <S%H3045><s%> thou not <S%H3808><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> are rulers <S%H4910><s%> over us? what <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2063><s%> that thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> unto us? And he said <S%H559><s%> unto them, As <S%H834><s%> they did <S%H6213><s%> unto me, so <S%H3651><s%> have I done <S%H6213><s%> unto them.

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto him, We are come down <S%H3381><s%> to bind <S%H631><s%> thee, that we may deliver <S%H5414><s%> thee into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%> And Samson <S%H8123><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Swear <S%H7650><s%> unto me, that <S%H6435><s%> ye will not fall <S%H6293><s%> upon me yourselves. <S%H859><s%>

And they spoke <S%H559><s%> unto him, saying, <S%H559><s%> No; <S%H3808><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> we will bind thee fast, <S%H631><s%> <S%H631><s%> and deliver <S%H5414><s%> thee into their hand: <S%H3027><s%> but surely we will not kill <S%H4191><s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H4191><s%> thee. And they bound <S%H631><s%> him with two <S%H8147><s%> new <S%H2319><s%> cords, <S%H5688><s%> and brought him up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the rock. <S%H5553><s%>

And when he <S%H1931><s%> came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Lehi, <S%H3896><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> shouted <S%H7321><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> him: and the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came mightily <S%H6743><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him, and the cords <S%H5688><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were upon <S%H5921><s%> his arms <S%H2220><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> as flax <S%H6593><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was burnt <S%H1197><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> and his bands <S%H612><s%> loosed <S%H4549><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> his hands. <S%H3027><s%>

And he found <S%H4672><s%> a new <S%H2961><s%> jawbone <S%H3895><s%> of an ass, <S%H2543><s%> and put forth <S%H7971><s%> his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> it, and slew <S%H5221><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> therewith.

And Samson <S%H8123><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> With the jawbone <S%H3895><s%> of an ass, <S%H2543><s%> heaps upon heaps, <S%H2565><s%> <S%H2565><s%> with the jaw <S%H3895><s%> of an ass <S%H2543><s%> have I slain <S%H5221><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> men. <S%H376><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when he had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of speaking, <S%H1696><s%> that he cast away <S%H7993><s%> the jawbone <S%H3895><s%> out of his hand, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> Ramath-lehi. <S%H7437><s%>

And he was sore athirst, <S%H6770><s%> <S%H3966><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> on <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Thou <S%H859><s%> hast given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> deliverance <S%H8668><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of thy servant: <S%H5650><s%> and now <S%H6258><s%> shall I die <S%H4191><s%> for thirst, <S%H6772><s%> and fall <S%H5307><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the uncircumcised? <S%H6189><s%>

But God <S%H430><s%> cleaved <S%H1234><s%> <S%H853><s%> a hollow place <S%H4388><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was in the jaw, <S%H3895><s%> and there came <S%H3318><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> therefrom; <S%H4480><s%> and when he had drunk, <S%H8354><s%> his spirit <S%H7307><s%> came again, <S%H7725><s%> and he revived: <S%H2421><s%> wherefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> he called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> thereof En-hakkore, <S%H5875><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in Lehi <S%H3896><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
And he judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>
